title: Python target encoding for categorical features
description: Target encoding with smoothingmin_samples_leaf define a threshold where prior and target mean (for a given category value) have the same weight. Below the threshold prior becomes more important and above mean becomes more important. How weight behaves against value counts is controlled by smoothing parameter
